title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -NFL Fantasy AI: Zero to Production in Weeks w/ Bedrock and Strands Agents-SPF304
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -NFL梦幻AI:使用Bedrock和Strands Agents在数周内从零到生产-SPF304
abstract: The NFL and AWS Generative AI Innovation Center developed NFL Pro Fantasy AI Assistant – an AI-powered virtual advisor helping 10,000+ fans make winning fantasy football decisions. The team will demonstrate how Strands Agents enabled the solution to go from zero to production in 8 weeks. Learn how Strands' model-driven approach simplified complex agent development, integrating NFL Next Gen Stats real-time data to answer critical questions like "Who should I start?" We will demonstrate architectural patterns achieving sub-5-second responses for player comparisons, injury analysis, and matchup recommendations while handling 10x NFL Sunday traffic. Discover how Strands helps teams ship production AI agents in weeks, not months. Perfect for engineers wanting startup speed with enterprise reliability.
abstract_cn: NFL 与 AWS 生成式 AI 创新中心开发了 NFL Pro Fantasy AI Assistant——一个由 AI 驱动的虚拟顾问，帮助 10,000 多名球迷做出成功的梦幻橄榄球决策。团队将演示 Strands Agents 如何使解决方案在 8 周内从零到生产环境。了解 Strands 的模型驱动方法如何简化复杂的智能体开发，集成 NFL Next Gen Stats 实时数据来回答关键问题，例如"我应该让谁首发？"我们将演示实现球员对比、伤病分析和对阵建议的亚 5 秒响应的架构模式，同时处理 NFL 周日 10 倍流量。探索 Strands 如何帮助团队在数周而非数月内交付生产级 AI 智能体。非常适合希望以初创公司速度实现企业级可靠性的工程师。
